Thread: How exactly is this “Nazi zombies”? You kill a zombie and get 150mil. I would try and make it round-based.[/quote]

You kill 250 zombies for 150M, If you didn’t get enough kill to kill the boss, you will be teleported at home without your money. They can’t glitch the drop.

Anyway you kill a zombie and he will stay on you.

item.title: [562]Create nazi zombies minigame[/562]
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“pivotgamer84, post:19, topic:382295”][quote author=Ddragonimp link=topic=478095.msg3501516#msg3501516 date=1297770856]
just a suggestion.
Should Use more Else if (
Statements
that way it will Read down your Menu Untill it finds an acceptable If
Then Continue on to the Next Bit of Code
Its why Timers use

if (timer > 0) {
     timer--;
} else {
     sM("");
}

Does 1 Check instead of 2
[/quote]

Not to mention:

case #####1:
if (countCheck()) {
stuff;
}
if (!countCheck()) {
amgHacks();
}
break;

case ####2:

 // Same thing

break;[/quote]
l2usecodetags

item.title: [562]Create nazi zombies minigame[/562]
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:13, topic:382295”]Why do so many people disrespect I Vain I? He is one of the few members of the community (I can barely name 5) actually trying to do something to get this community to go forward, instead of being filled with absolute idiots like this fellow:

I Vain I stop acting like ur bad ass and shut the fuck up
all u do in topics is tell ppl what they did wrong even tho ur probably some fat ass at home always on his computer
stop posting dumbass comments or get the FUCK OUT!!!

Who do things like this:

If you do not wish to improve, then YOU gtfo - Moparscape has no need for MORE wannabe coders who download a server, change the name, add a few commands and go “AMG I MADE A SERVER!!!1!!!one1!!oen!!” then release it because “they got bored from working months and even years” on a server that fails and sucks balls.

Then rage at other members of the community because they’re stupid. This community pisses me off. I’ll be the first to admit I wasn’t the smartest person when I came here, in fact I was really stupid. If you want to read my first posts, you’ll learn how stupid I was. And still, I’m no Java genius in any way, shape, or form. But I didn’t go around flaming and attacking people who were/are much smarter than me and were only trying to help. I didn’t come here, download a source, change the name, and release it. In fact I’ve released one server, which wasn’t very good in my opinion but was received fairly well. Enough about me, however.

/rant[/quote]

sorry, I didn’t realize that he just wanted to help people to get codes with conventions…

Read full topic
